title: Ledge or Tand - means a shelf like projection, supported in any manner whatsoever, except by vertical supports within a room
clause_text: Ledge or Tand - means a shelf like projection, supported in any manner whatsoever, except by vertical supports within a room.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
